HR Metrics (Performance Appraisal Data Generation Framework Development)

HR Metric is designed to aid the development of a performance management system that links the corporate strategic objectives with company-wide employee daily operational activities. It also provides for the development of a framework that simplify and aid the generation of required performance management data.

HR Metric -Features

  • The HR Metric is developed to provide for the development of both the data structure and the data generation framework as well as having to process the data for effective transformation into usable form for decision makers.
  • Identifying the required data for performance appraisal and management as well as ensuring that the data are well or effectively structured is very important and this need is well provided by the Metric Source.
  • The functionality of Metric Source therefore can be said to provide comprehensively for the need of organizations with regard to their performance management requirements.
  • Development of performance management system.
  • Development of performance data generation framework.
  • Analysis and re-presentation of performance appraisal/management outcomes. For a demo,
click here
  • Metrics-Suite Solution
  • Performance Management System Development
  • Hr Metric Solution
  • KPI Analytics

    Other Interesting Features

  • Designed to extract both qualitative and quantitative data required for effective performance appraisal/management
  • Provision of real-time employee performance assessment rating across all existing tiers/levels within the organization.
  • Provision of online real-time job reporting and collaboration via a mini workflow/effective attachment, and movement of documents for task allocation, report submission, review and rating.
  • Prevent subjectivity in employee performance rating.

    Metric Suites Benefits

  • Its inbuilt capability allows for the extraction of the required performance management measures such as; job turnaround time, job volume/quantity performance analysis, and job quality via error rates etc.
  • It places the non-performance burden and the joy of a performer on the various employees respectively
  • It aids and boosts team collaboration for good performance and results.
  • It facilitates the presentation and analysis of performance outcomes in a user-friendly form via the dashboard for decision-makers
  • It aids the execution of Balance Scorecard as well as other performance management frameworks.
  • It allows for remote working environment (Work From Home-Work From Anywhere)
